segments.text: Did you know that drinking beer helps you sing better ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure ? How do you know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , usually people think I'm a terrible singer , but after we all have a few beers , they say I sound a lot better !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I heard that if you drink enough beer , you can speak foreign languages better ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then after a few beers , you'll be singing in Taiwanese ?
segments.speaker: S1
